anya-e0807n0:10: Yā satti pāṇine yā ca, candra+kātyāyanādisu;
anya-e0807n0:12: Suttaṁ vutti ca teneva, katā ekena pañcikā;
anya-e0807n0:14: Tamhi ca dubbidhaṁ ñeyyaṁ, suttaṁ kammatthabhedato;
anya-e0807n0:19_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti. Taṁ yathā a, ā, i, ī,
anya-e0807n0:19_1: u, ū, e, ऐ, o, औ, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da
anya-e0807n0:19_2: dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ. Tena kvattho “e ona+ma vaṇṇe”ti.
anya-e0807n0:19_3: Titālīsāti vacanaṁ katthaci vaṇṇalopaṁ ñāpeti, tena “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādi siddhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:20: Akāro ādi mariyādabhūto yesaṁ te aādayo. Tayo ca cattālīsa ceti titālīsa, iminā nipātanena vā catabhāgalopo. Vaṇṇīyati attho etehīti vaṇṇā.
anya-e0807n0:21: Etthā+ha – “kasmā ācariyakaccāyanādīhi viya ekacattālīsakkharāna+makkharasañña+makatvā titālīsakkharānaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katā”ti. Vuccate –
anya-e0807n0:24_0: Vacanato māgadhikānaṁ ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi-tyādīsupi asesabyāpikānaṁ titālīsakkharānaṁva
anya-e0807n0:24_1: ujukānvatthappakkharaguṇikā, neva pana ‘rukkhā vanaṁ’tyādo viya avayave samudāyavohāro,
anya-e0807n0:24_2: ‘samuddo mayā diṭṭho’tyādo viya ca samudāye avayavavohāroti dassetuṁ paccekaṁ vaṇṇasaññā katāti.
anya-e0807n0:25: “Sakkaccasavanaṁ buddhasāsanasampattī”ti “sithiladhanitādi akkharavipattiyañhi atthassa dunnayatā hotī”ti ca yasmā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:28: Tattha akārādīna+manukkamo pane+sa ṭhānādikkamasannissito. Tathā hi ṭhāna+karaṇa+payatanehi vaṇṇā jāyanti. Tattha cha ṭhānāni kaṇṭha+tālu+muddha+danta+oṭṭha+nāsikāvasena.
anya-e0807n0:29_0: Tattha avaṇṇa+kavagga+hānaṁ kaṇṭho ṭhānaṁ, ivaṇṇa+cavagga+yānaṁ tālu, ṭavagga+ra+ḷānaṁ
anya-e0807n0:29_1: muddhā, tavagga+la+sānaṁ dantā, uvaṇṇa+pavaggānaṁ oṭṭho, e vaṇṇassa kaṇṭhatālū, o
anya-e0807n0:29_2: vaṇṇassa kaṇṭho+ṭṭhā, vakārassa danto+ṭṭhā, niggahītassa nāsikā, ṅa, ñña, ṇa, na,
anya-e0807n0:29_3: mānaṁ sakaṭhānaṁ nāsikā ca. Ettha ca –
anya-e0807n0:32: Yathā avaṅhoti (avaṅa hoti., tañhi, taṇhā, pubbanho, amhe, guyhaṁ, gārayhā, ārulho, bahvakkharanti.
anya-e0807n0:38_0: Vaṇṇānaṁ uccāraṇussāho payatanaṁ, taṁ kiṁ – saṁvutādikaraṇaviseso, saṁvutatta+makārassa,
anya-e0807n0:38_1: vivaṭattaṁ sesasarānaṁ sakāra+hakārānañca, phuṭṭhattaṁ vaggānaṁ, īsaṁphuṭṭhattaṁ ya+ra+la+vānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:39: Evaṁ ṭhāna+karaṇa+payatana+suti kālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0807n0:40: Nissayā+do sarā vuttā, nissitā byañjanā tato;
anya-e0807n0:42: “Aādayo”ti vattate yāva “bindu niggahīta”nti. Tañca kho “atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmo”ti sattamyanta+mabhisambandhīyate, “vaṇṇā”ti vattate –
anya-e0807n0:44: Aādīsvā+dimhi niddiṭṭhā odantā dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti. Yathā a ā, i ī, u ū, e ऐ, o औ. Saranti=sappadhānabhāvena pavattanti, byañjane vā sārentīti sarā.
anya-e0807n0:47_0: Aādīsvā+dimesu dasasu dve dve savaṇṇā nāma honti yathākkamaṁ. Yathā a āiti, i īiti,
anya-e0807n0:47_1: u ū iti, e eiti, o, oiti. Samānā sadisā vaṇṇā savaṇṇā, samānattañca ṭhānato. “Dve
anya-e0807n0:49_0: Tesveva dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā, tesu yo yo pubbo, so so rassasañño hoti. Yathā
anya-e0807n0:49_1: a i u e o. Tesu ‘saṁyogato pubbāva dissanti dve panantimā’ta dassetuṁ tattha sādhuttā
anya-e0807n0:49_2: tesampi idha saṅgaho, yathā ettha seyyo oṭṭho sotthi. Rassakālayogā tabbantatāya
anya-e0807n0:49_3: vā rassā. Rassakālo nāma accharāsaṅghāto akkhinimmilanasaṅkhāto vā kālo, tena ekamatto
anya-e0807n0:49_4: rasso, dvimatto dīgho, aḍḍhamatto byañjano. Chandasi diyaḍḍhamattampi rassanti gaṇhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0807n0:51: Aādīsvā+dibhūtesu dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā, tesu yo yo paro, so so dīghasañño hoti. Taṁ yathā ā ī ū e o. Dīghakālayogā tabbantatāya vā dīghā.
anya-e0807n0:53_0: Aādīsu kādayo niggahītapariyantā tettiṁsa byañjanā nāma honti. Yathā ka kha ga gha
anya-e0807n0:53_1: ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra
anya-e0807n0:53_2: lava sa ha ḷa aṁ iti. Byañjīyati attho etehīti byañjanā. Kakārādīsva+kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0807n0:56_0: Aādīsu kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcakā vaggā nāma honti. Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa,
anya-e0807n0:56_1: ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma iti. Pañca
anya-e0807n0:56_2: pañca parimāṇa+mesaṁ pañcapañcakā. Vajjenti yakārādayoti vaggā. Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena
anya-e0807n0:58: Akārādīsva+yaṁ vaṇṇo bindumatto, so niggahītasañño hoti. Rassasaraṁ nissāya gahita+muccāritaṁ niggahītaṁ, karaṇaṁ niggahetvā vā.
anya-e0807n0:62: Vaṇṇā sarā savaṇṇā ca, rassā dīghā ca byañjanā;
anya-e0807n0:66_0: Loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṁ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṁ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:66_1: sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṁ, dhanaṁ me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā, asanto
anya-e0807n0:68_0: Sare saro lopanīyo hoti. Saroti kāriyīniddeso, lopoti kāriyaniddeso. Lopo= adassanaṁ
anya-e0807n0:68_1: anuccāraṇaṁ, saroti jātyekavacanavasena vuttaṁ, sareti opasilesikādhārasattamī, tato
anya-e0807n0:68_2: vaṇṇa kāla byavadhāne kāriyaṁ na hoti, tva+masi, katamā cānanda aniccasaññāti. Evaṁ sabbasandhīsu.
anya-e0807n0:71_0: Therayaṭṭhinyāyena pavattate paribhāsā dubbalavidhino patiṭṭhābhāvato. Sattamīniddese
anya-e0807n0:71_1: pubbasseva vidhīti pubbasaralopo. Lokaggapuggalo, paññindriyaṁ, tīṇimāni, no hetaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:71_2: bhikkhunovādo, mātupaṭṭhānaṁ, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṁ, dhanaṁmatthi, sabbeva,
anya-e0807n0:71_3: tayassu dhammā, asante+ttha na dissanti. Pubbassa kāriyavidhānā sattamīniddiṭṭhassa
anya-e0807n0:72_0: Yassa idāni, saññā iti, chāyā iva, iti api, assamaṇī asi, cakkhu indriyaṁ, akataññū
anya-e0807n0:72_1: asi, ākāse iva, te api, vande ahaṁ, so ahaṁ, cattāro ime, vasalo iti, moggallāno
anya-e0807n0:72_2: asi bījako, kathā eva kā, pāto evātī+dha pubbassaralope sampatte “saro lopo sare” tveva.
anya-e0807n0:74_0: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti. Yassa dāni, saññāti, chāyāva, itipi, assamaṇīsi,
anya-e0807n0:74_1: cakkhundriyaṁ, akataññūsi, ākāseva, tepi, vandehaṁ, sohaṁ, cattārome, vasa- lobhi,
anya-e0807n0:74_2: moggallānosi bījako, kathāva kā, pātova. Kvacīti kiṁ, paññindriyaṁ, pañcindriyāni,
anya-e0807n0:74_3: sattuttamo, ekūnavīsati, yassete, sugatovādo, diṭṭhāsavo, diṭṭhogho, cakkhāyatanaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:74_4: taṁ kutettha labbhā. “Vivakkhāto sandhayo bhavantī”ti ñāyā vatticchāpi idha sijjhati.
anya-e0807n0:76: Tassa idaṁ, vāta īritaṁ, na upeti, vāma ūru, ati iva aññehi, vi udakaṁ itīdha pubbassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:78: Luttā sarā paresaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ e+o honti vā yathākkamaṁ. Yathāsaṁkhyānuddeso samānānaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:80_0: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā, tena savaṇṇopi gayhati sayañca rūpaṁti īūnampi e+o. Sabbattha
anya-e0807n0:80_1: rassassa jātiniddese dīghassāpi gahaṇatthaṁ ida+māraddhaṁ. Tassedaṁ, vāteritaṁ, nopeti,
anya-e0807n0:80_2: vāmoru, atevaññehi, vodakaṁ. Idañca pacchimodāharaṇadvayaṁ “avaṇṇe lutte eva e+o
anya-e0807n0:80_3: hontī”ti gāhassa nisedhanatthaṁ. Vātveva, tassidaṁ. Kathaṁ “paccorasmi”nti, yogavibhāgā.
anya-e0807n0:80_4: Pati urasminti vibhajja “yavā sare”ti yakāre “tavaggavaraṇā”dinā co, “vaggalasehi
anya-e0807n0:80_5: te”ti pubbarūpañca, “yuvaṇṇāna+meo”ti (yogavibhāgā) ussa o ca. Luttāti kiṁ, dasa
anya-e0807n0:80_6: ime dhammā, yathā idaṁ, kusalassa upasampadā. Atippasaṅgabādhakassa kvacisaddassānuvattanato
anya-e0807n0:80_7: na vikappavidhi niyatā, tena upeto, aveccāti evamādīsu vikappo. Tārakitā, yassindriyāni,
anya-e0807n0:80_8: mahiddhiko, sabbītiyo, tenupasaṅkami, lokuttarotiādīsu vidhi ca na hoti.
anya-e0807n0:81_0: Paṭisanthāravutti assa, sabbavitti anubhūyate, vi añjanaṁ, vi ākato, dāsī ahaṁ, ahuvā
anya-e0807n0:81_1: pure, anu addhamāsaṁ, anu eti, su āgataṁ, su ākāro, du ākāro, cakkhu āpāthaṁ, bahu
anya-e0807n0:81_2: ābādho, pātu akāsi, na tu eva, bhū āpanalānilaṁ itī+dha “yuvaṇṇānaṁ” “ve”ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n0:83_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā yathākkamaṁ. Paṭisanthāravutyassa,
anya-e0807n0:83_1: sabbavityanubhūyate, byañjanaṁ, byākato “byañjane dīgharassā”ti dīghe dāsyāhaṁ, ahāpure,
anya-e0807n0:83_2: anvaddhamāsaṁ, anveti, svāgataṁ, svākāro, dvākāro, cakkhvāpāthaṁ, bahvābādho, pātvākāsi,
anya-e0807n0:83_3: na tveva, bhvāpanalānilaṁ. Vātveva, viākato, sāgataṁ.
anya-e0807n0:84_0: Adhigato kho me ayaṁ dhammo, putto te ahaṁ, te assa pahīnā pañca, te ahaṁ, ye assa,
anya-e0807n0:84_1: te ajja, yāvatako assa kāyo, tāvatako assa byāmo, ko attho, atha kho assa, ahaṁ kho
anya-e0807n0:84_2: ajja, so ahaṁ, so ajja, so eva, yato adhikaraṇaṁ, so ahaṁ itī+dha “yavā sare” “ve”ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n0:86_0: Eonaṁ yakāra+vakārā honti vā sare pare yathākkamaṁ. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti dīghe
anya-e0807n0:86_1: adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, putto tyāhaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā pañca, tyāhaṁ, yyassa, tyajja,
anya-e0807n0:86_2: yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo, kvattho, atha khvassa, ahaṁ khvajja, svāhaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:86_3: svajja, sveva, yatvādhikaraṇaṁ, svāhaṁ. Vātveva, tejja, sohaṁ. Kvaci tveva, dhanamatthi,
anya-e0807n0:86_4: puttāmatthi, te nāgatā, asantettha, cattāro ime.
anya-e0807n0:87: Go eḷakaṁ, go assaṁ, go ajinaṁ itī+dha “sare”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:89: Sare pare gossa avavādeso hoti. Sa ca “ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassā”ti sabbassa pasaṅge ‘antassā”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:91_0: Ṅa-kāro anubandho yassa, so anekavaṇṇopi antassa hotīti okārasseva hoti. “Saṁketo+navayavo+nubandho”ti
anya-e0807n0:91_1: vacanā ṅa-kārassā+ppayogo. Uccāritānantarappadhaṁsino hi anubandhā, payojanaṁ anubandhoti
anya-e0807n0:94: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Sa ca –
anya-e0807n0:96_0: Chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ, ta+dantassa viññeyyanti ikārassā+deso. Ādesiṭṭhāne
anya-e0807n0:96_1: ādissatīti ādeso. Itveva. Aññatra yādeso, “tavaggavaraṇānaṁ ye cavaggabayañā”ti tassa
anya-e0807n0:96_2: co, “vaggalasehi te”ti yassa cakāro, icceva. Eveti kiṁ, iccāha. (Ādesasandhi).
anya-e0807n0:97: Ti aṅgulaṁ,ti aṅgikaṁ, bhū ādayo, migī bhantā udikkhatityādisandhayo vuccante. “Mayadā sare”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:99: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti vā sare kvaci. Āgamino aniyamepi –
anya-e0807n0:102_0: Etthā+gamā aniyatāgamīnameva bhavanti ce, yakārāgameneva “nipajja”nti siddhe “padādīnaṁ
anya-e0807n0:102_1: kvacī”ti byañjanassa yukā+gamo niratthakoti adhippāyo. Tivaṅgulaṁ, tivaṅgikaṁ, bhūvādayo,
anya-e0807n0:102_2: migī bhantā vudikkhati, pavuccati, pāguññavujutā. Ito nāyati, cinitvā. Yasmātiha,
anya-e0807n0:102_3: tasmātiha, ajjatagge. Nirantaraṁ, nirālayo, nirindhano, nirīhakaṁ, niruttaro, nirojaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:102_4: duratikkamo, durāgataṁ, duruttaraṁ, pāturahosi, punarāgaccheyya, punaruttaṁ, punareva,
anya-e0807n0:102_5: punareti, dhīratthu, pātarāso, caturaṅgikaṁ, caturārakkhaṁ, caturiddhipādapaṭilābho,
anya-e0807n0:102_7: tārakānaṁ, vijjurivabbhakuṭe, āraggeriva sāsapo, usabhoriva, sabbhireva samāsetha.
anya-e0807n0:102_8: Puthageva, rasse pageva. Lahumessati, gurumessati, idhamāhu, kena te idha mijjhati,
anya-e0807n0:102_9: bhadro kasāmiva, ākāse mabhipūjaye, ekamekassa, yena midhekacce. Bhātiyeva, hotiyeva,
anya-e0807n0:102_10: yathāyidaṁ, yathāyeva, māyidaṁ, nayidaṁ, nayidha, chayimāni, navayime dhammā, bodhiyāyeva,
anya-e0807n0:102_11: pathavīyeva dhātu, tesuyeva, teyeva, soyeva, pāṭiyekkaṁ, viyañjanaṁ, viyākāsi, pariyantaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:102_12: pariyādānaṁ, pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, pariyesati, pariyosānaṁ, niyāyogo. Udaggo, udayo, udāhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:102_13: udito, udīritaṁ, udeti, sakideva, kiñcideva, kenacideva, kismiñcideva, kocideva,
anya-e0807n0:102_14: sammadatto, sammadaññā vimuttānaṁ, sammadeva, yāvadatthaṁ, yāvadicchakaṁ, yāvadeva,
anya-e0807n0:102_15: tāvadeva, punadeva, yadatthaṁ, yadantaraṁ, tadantaraṁ, tadaṅgavimutti, etadatthaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:102_16: attadatthaṁ, tadatthaṁ, sadatthapasuto siyā, aññadatthu, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:102_17: bahudeva ratti. Vātveva, attaatthaṁ, dvādhiṭṭhitaṁ, pātuahosi. Vavatthitavibhāsattā
anya-e0807n0:102_18: vādhikārassa byañjanatopi, bhikkhunīnaṁ vuṭṭhāpeyya, ciraṁ nāyati, taṁyeva.
anya-e0807n0:103: Cha abhiññā, cha aṅgaṁ, cha asīti, cha aṁsā, cha āyatanaṁ itī+dha “vā sare” “āgamo”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0807n0:105: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā. Chāti anukaraṇattā ekavacanaṁ. Chaḷabhiññā, chaḷaṅgaṁ, chaḷasīti, chaḷaṁsā, chaḷāyatanaṁ. Vātveva, chaabhiññā. (Āgamasandhi).
anya-e0807n0:107: Ādeso nāma so yā tu, asantuppatti āgamo.
anya-e0807n0:109: Kaññā iva, kaññāva iccādi sarasandhinisedho vuccati, pasaṅgapubbako hi paṭisedho. Pubbasarānaṁ lope sampatte “saro” “ve”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0807n0:111: Pubbaparassarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante. Kaññā iva, kaññeva, kaññāva.
anya-e0807n0:112_0: Sāriputta idhekacco, ehi sivaka uṭṭhehi, āyasmā ānando, gāthā abhāsi, devā ābhassarā
anya-e0807n0:112_1: yathā, tevijjā iddhipattā ca, bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā, bhagavā eta+davoca, abhivādetvā
anya-e0807n0:112_2: ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi, gantvā olokento, bhūtavādī atthavādī, yaṁ itthī arahaṁ assa, sāmāvatī
anya-e0807n0:112_3: āha, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati, nadī ottharati, ye te bhikkhū appicchā, bhikkhū
anya-e0807n0:112_4: āmantesi, bhikkhū ujjhāyiṁsu, bhikkhū eva+māhaṁsu, imasmiṁ gāme ārakkhakā, sabbe
anya-e0807n0:112_5: ime, katame ekādasa, gambhīre odakantike, appamādo amataṁ padaṁ, saṅgho āgacchatu,
anya-e0807n0:112_6: ko imaṁ pathaviṁ vicessati, āloko udapādi, eko ekāya, cattāro oghā, are ahampi, sace
anya-e0807n0:112_7: imassa kāyassa, no atikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho āyasmā, atho oṭṭhava+cittakā,
anya-e0807n0:112_8: tato ā- mantayi satthāti evamādayo idha kālabyavadhāneneva sijjhanti. Kvacīti kiṁ,
anya-e0807n0:112_9: āgatā+ttha, āgatā+mhā, katama+ssa vāro, appassutā+yaṁ puriso, camarī+va, sabbe+va,
anya-e0807n0:112_10: sve+va, ese+va nayo, parisuddhe+tthā+yasmanto, ne+ttha, kute+ttha labbhā, sace+sa
anya-e0807n0:112_11: brāhmaṇa, tathū+pamaṁ, yathā+ha, jīvhā+yatanaṁ, avijjo+gho, itthindriyaṁ, abhibhā+yatanaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:113_0: Tatra abhirati, tatra ayaṁ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, saññāvā assa, tadā ahaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:113_1: yāni idha bhūtāni, gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva, bahu upakāraṁ, madhu udakaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:113_2: su upadhāritaṁ, sopi ayaṁ, idāni ahaṁ, sace ayaṁ, appassuto ayaṁ, itara itarena,
anya-e0807n0:113_3: saddhā idha vittaṁ, kamma upanissayo, tathā upamaṁ, ratti uparato, vi upasamo, lokassa
anya-e0807n0:113_4: iti, deva iti, vi atipatanti, vi atināmenti, saṅghāṭi api, jīvitahetu api, vijju
anya-e0807n0:113_5: iva, kiṁsu idha vittaṁ, sādhu iti, te assa pahīnā, so assa, madhuvā maññati bālo,
anya-e0807n0:113_6: evaṁ gāme muni care, khanti paramaṁ tapo titikkhā, na maṁku bhavissāmi, su akkhāto,
anya-e0807n0:113_7: yo ahaṁ, so ahaṁ, kāmato jāyati soko, kāmato jāyati bhayaṁ, sakko uju ca suhujuca,
anya-e0807n0:113_8: anupaghāto, durakkhaṁ, duramaṁ, dubharatā. Yiṭṭhaṁ vā hutaṁ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake,
anya-e0807n0:113_9: puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so, yathā idaṁ, sammā
anya-e0807n0:113_10: dakkhāto, parā kamo, taṇhā kkhayo, jhānassa lābhī amhi, thullaccayo itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:115_0: Rassa+dīghānaṁ kvaci dīgha+rassā honti byañjane. Tatrābhirati, tatrāyaṁ, buddhānussati,
anya-e0807n0:115_1: sātthikā, saññāvā+ssa, tadāhaṁ, yānī+dha bhūtāni, gacchāmīti, atīto, kikīva, bahūpakāraṁ,
anya-e0807n0:115_2: madhūdakaṁ, sūpadhāritaṁ, sopāyaṁ, idānāhaṁ, sacāyaṁ, appassutāyaṁ, itarītarena,
anya-e0807n0:115_3: saddhīdha vittaṁ, kammūpanissayo, tathūpamaṁ, rattūparato, vūpasamo, lokassāti, devāti,
anya-e0807n0:115_4: vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṁsūdha vittaṁ, sādhūti,
anya-e0807n0:115_5: tyāssa pahīnā, svāssa, madhuvā maññatī bālo, evaṁ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṁ
anya-e0807n0:115_6: tapo titikkhā, na maṁkū bhavissāmi, svākkhāto, yvāhaṁ, svāhaṁ, kāmato jāyatī soko,
anya-e0807n0:115_7: kāmato jāyatī bhayaṁ, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, anūpaghāto, dūrakkhaṁ, dūramaṁ, dūbharatā.
anya-e0807n0:115_8: Yiṭṭhaṁva hutaṁva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti,
anya-e0807n0:115_9: yathābhāvi guṇena so, yathayidaṁ, sammadakkhāto, parakkamo, taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa
anya-e0807n0:115_10: lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo. Kvacīti kiṁ, tyajja, svassa, patiliyatīti dīghanisedho,
anya-e0807n0:115_11: māyidaṁ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, yathākkamaṁ, ārakkhātītaṁ, dīyati, sūyatīti rassakāriyanisedho.
anya-e0807n0:118: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti. Ettha ca āvuttidvivacanaṁ ṭhānedvivacananti dvīsu ṭhānedvivacanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_1: hoti. Idha pamādo=idhappamādo, evaṁ appamādo, vippayutto, suppasanno, sammā padhānaṁ=sammappadhānaṁ
anya-e0807n0:119_2: rassattaṁ. Appativattiyo, adhippatipaccayo, suppatiṭṭhito,. Appaṭipuggalo, vippaṭisāro,
anya-e0807n0:119_3: suppaṭipatti. Pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati=akkamati, evaṁ pakkamati, yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:119_4: Akkosati, paṭikkosati, anukkosati, ākosati=akkosati. Akkuddho, abhikkuddho. Dhanakkīto,
anya-e0807n0:119_5: vikkayo, anukkayo. Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, candaggāho, diṭṭhiggāho. Pajjoto,
anya-e0807n0:119_6: vijjoto, ujjoto. Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ, anaññāṇaṁ. Avassayo, nissayo,
anya-e0807n0:119_7: samussayo. Appassuto, vissuto, bahussuto. Āsavā=assavā. Passambhento, vissambhento.
anya-e0807n0:119_8: Aṭṭassaro, vissarati, anussarati, anussati. Passasanto, vissasanto, muhussasanto,
anya-e0807n0:119_9: āsāso=assāso. Ādisaddena avissajento, vissajento, abhikkantataro, pariccajento, upaddavo,
anya-e0807n0:120_1: Lokattayaṁ, bodhittayaṁ, vatthuttayaṁ. Ekattiṁsa, dvattiṁsa, tettiṁsa, catuttiṁsa.
anya-e0807n0:120_2: Sīlabbataṁ, subbato. Sappītiko, samannāgato, punappunaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n0:121: Vatu+vaṭa+disāna+mante, yathā vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṁ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0807n0:122_1: nikkaṅkho, uggataṁ, duccaritaṁ, nijjaṭaṁ, ujjahaṁ, uccaṅgaṁ, unnamati, dukkaro, niddaro,
anya-e0807n0:122_2: unnato, duppañño, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, nissāro. Takkaro,
anya-e0807n0:122_3: tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo, catukkaṁ, catuddisaṁ, catuppado, catubbidhaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:122_4: catussālaṁ, chakkaṁ, channavuti, chappadiko, chabbassāni. Sakkāro, sagguṇo, sandiṭṭhi,
anya-e0807n0:123: Apadantaākāravajjitadīghato yakārassa ca, niyyāti, suyyati, abhibhuyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṁ, neyyaṁ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo. Ākāravajjitanti kiṁ, mālāya, dolāya, samādāya.
anya-e0807n0:124_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe-nappajahe vaṇṇabalaṁ purāṇaṁ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatiṁ.
anya-e0807n0:124_1: Saramhāti kiṁ, ñāyo, taṁkhaṇaṁ. Kvacitveva, nikāyo, nidānaṁ, nivāso, tato, chasaṭṭhi, upanīyati, sūyati.
anya-e0807n0:126_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresve+saṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsatyā.
anya-e0807n0:126_1: Vagge gha+jha+ḍha+dha+bhā catutthā, kha+cha+ṭha+tha+phā dutiyā, ga+ja+ḍa+da+bā tatiyā,
anya-e0807n0:126_2: ka+ca+ṭa+ta+pā paṭhamā. Pa+u+du-niādīhi paresaṁ ghādīnaṁ dvibhāve tatiyapaṭhamā honti.
anya-e0807n0:126_3: Pagarati=paggharati, evaṁ uggharati, nigghoso, ugghāṭeti. Esova tajjhānaphalo, paṭhamajjhānaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:126_4: abhijjhā-yati, ujjhāyati. Daḍḍho, buḍḍho. Viddhaṁseti, uddhaṁsito, uddhāro, niddhano,
anya-e0807n0:126_5: niddhuto. Vibbhanto, ubbhanto, samubbhanto, dubbhikkhaṁ, nibbhayaṁ, tabbhāvo, catubbhi.
anya-e0807n0:127_0: Rassasarehi paresaṁ vaggadutiyānaṁ dvibhāvo ce, paṭhamā. Pañcakkhandhā, evaṁ rūpakkhandho,
anya-e0807n0:127_1: akkhamo, abhikkhaṇaṁ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṁ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo. Setacchattaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:127_2: evaṁ sabbacchannaṁ, vicchannaṁ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo. Tatra ṭhito=tatraṭṭhito,
anya-e0807n0:127_3: evaṁ thalaṭṭhaṁ, jalaṭṭhaṁ, aṭṭhitaṁ, niṭṭhitaṁ, cattāriṭṭhānāni, garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito.
anya-e0807n0:127_4: Sabbatthāmena, yasatthero, pattharati, vitthāro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:127_5: Papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṁ, anipphalaṁ, vipphāro, paripphuṭeyya, madhupphāṇitaṁ. Ākārato,
anya-e0807n0:127_6: ākhāto=akkhāto, evaṁ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṁ, saññākkhandho. Āchādayi=acchādayi,
anya-e0807n0:127_7: evaṁ acchindati, nāvaṭṭhaṁ, attharati, apphoṭeti. Kvaci tveva, puvakhajjakaṁ, tassa
anya-e0807n0:127_8: chaviādīni chinditvā, yathāṭhitaṁ, kammaphalaṁ, sīlaṁ tassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā
anya-e0807n0:128: Akaramha se te, so kho byanti kāhiti, so gacchaṁ na nivattati, eso attho, eso ābhogo, eso idāni itī+dha “ve”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:130_0: Eonaṁ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā. Akaramha sa te, akaramha se te, evaṁ sa kho byanti kāhiti,
anya-e0807n0:130_1: sa gacchaṁ na nivattati, esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni. Vaṇṇeti kiṁ, amoghavacano
anya-e0807n0:130_2: ca so, gandhabbānaṁ adhipati, mahārājā yasassi soti. “Na sandhisamāsā vaddhassā”ti
anya-e0807n0:130_3: vuttattā gāthāmajjhe sandhi na hotīti “tividhassā”ti vuttatimhi parepi vaṇṇo paro
anya-e0807n0:131: Ata yantaṁ, tatha yaṁ, mada yaṁ, budha yati, dhana yaṁ, seva yo, para yesanā, pokkharaṇa yo itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:133_0: Tavaggavaraṇānaṁ cavaggabayañā honti yathākkamaṁ yakāre. “Vaggalasehi te”ti pubbarūpaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:133_1: Accantaṁ, tacchaṁ, majjaṁ, bujjhati, dhaññaṁ, sebbo, payyesanā, pokkharañño. Apuccaṇḍakāyaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:133_2: jaccandho, yajjevaṁ, ajjhagamā, ajjhattaṁ, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā, dibbaṁ. Kvacitveva, ratyā.
anya-e0807n0:134: Saka yate, ruca yate, paca yate, aṭa yate, lupa yate, kupa yate, sala yate, phala yate, disa yate, asa yate itī+dha “ye”ti vattate vakkhamānesu dvīsu.
anya-e0807n0:136: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti. Sakkate, ruccate, paccate, aṭṭate, luppate, kuppate, sallate, phallate, dissate, assate. Kvacitveva, kyāhaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:139: Hassa vipallāso hoti yakāre. Muyhati, guyhati.
anya-e0807n0:140: Bahu ābādho itī+dha ussavakāre “hassa vipallāso”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n0:142: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho. Vātveva, bahvābādho.
anya-e0807n0:144_0: Tathanarānaṁ ṭaṭhaṇalā honti vā yathākkamaṁ. Dukkataṁ=dukkaṭaṁ, evaṁ sukaṭaṁ, patthaṭo,
anya-e0807n0:144_1: pataṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo. Aṭṭhakathā. Paṇidhānaṁ, paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṁ, pariṇato,
anya-e0807n0:144_2: pariṇāmo, duṇṇayo, niṇṇayo, oṇato. Paripanno=palipanno, evaṁ palibodho, pallaṅkaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:145: Cakkhu udapādi, akkhi rujati, purima jāti, aṇu thūlāni, kattabba kusalaṁ bahuṁ, ta sampayuttā, tata sabhāvato itī+dha “ve”ti vattate yāva “mayadā sare”ti.
anya-e0807n0:147_0: Niggahītāgamo hoti vā kvaci. Sāmatthiyenā+gamova, sa ca rassasarasseva hoti… tassa
anya-e0807n0:147_1: rassasarānugatattā. Ṭhānīna+māliṅghiya gacchati pavattatīti āgamo. Cakkhuṁ udapādi,
anya-e0807n0:147_2: akkhiṁ rujati, purimaṁ jāti, aṇuṁ thūlāni, kattabbaṁ kusalaṁ bahuṁ, taṁsampayuttā,
anya-e0807n0:147_3: taṁtaṁsabhāvato. Vāggahaṇena cakkhu udapādi iccādi. Avaṁsiro, yāvañcidaṁtiādi niccaṁ…
anya-e0807n0:147_4: vavatthitavibhāsattā vādhikārassa, vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassā+nurodhena lakkhaṇe pavattitā
anya-e0807n0:147_5: vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā. Vāsaddo hi atthadvaye vattate katthaci vikappe, katthaci
anya-e0807n0:147_6: yathāvavatthitarūpapariggaheti. Yadā pacchime, tadā nicca+manicca+masantañca vidhiṁ
anya-e0807n0:147_7: dīpeti. Ettha pana kvacisaddassā+nuvattanā tenevā+santavidhi siddhoti vāsaddeni+taradvayaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:147_8: Kvaci tveva, na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0807n0:148: Saṁ rambho, saṁ ratto, saṁ rāgo, tāsaṁ ahaṁ santike, evaṁ ayaṁ, puṁ liṅgaṁ, kiṁ ahaṁ, tassa adāsiṁ ahaṁ itī+dha “niggahītā”dhikāro ā “mayadā sare”ti.
anya-e0807n0:150_0: Niggahītassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Dīghe sārambho saṁrambho, sāratto saṁratto, sārāgo
anya-e0807n0:150_1: saṁrāgo, pubbassaralope tāsāhaṁ santike, evāyaṁ, dvitte pulliṅgaṁ puṁliṅgaṁ, kyāhaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:150_2: tassa adāsahaṁ. Paṭisallāno, sallekho, pātukāmo, gantumano, ariyasaccāna dassanaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:150_3: etaṁ buddhāna sāsanaṁ, avisāhāro, cirappavāsintiādīsu niccaṁ. Kvacīti kiṁ, eva+mayaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:151: Kataṁ iti, abhinanduṁ iti, uttattaṁ iva, cakkaṁ iva, kaliṁiva, halaṁ idāni, kiṁ idāni, tvaṁ asi, idaṁ api, uttariṁ api, dātuṁ api, sadisaṁ eva itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:153_0: Niggahītamhā parasarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Katanti, abhinandunti, uttattaṁva, cakkaṁva,
anya-e0807n0:153_1: kaliṁva, halaṁdāni, kiṁdāni, tvaṁsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṁva. Vāti
anya-e0807n0:153_2: kiṁ, kataṁiti, kimiti, dātumapi, sadisaṁ eva.
anya-e0807n0:154: Pupphaṁ assā uppajjati, evaṁ assa te āsavā itī+dha parassaralope –
anya-e0807n0:156_0: Abyavahitānaṁ dvinnaṁ byañjanānaṁ ekatra ṭhiti saṁyogo, tasmiṁ saṁyoge yo ādibhūtāvayavo,
anya-e0807n0:156_1: tassa vā kvaci lopo hotītiādibyañjanassa lopo. Pupphaṁsā uppajjati, evaṁsa te āsavā.
anya-e0807n0:156_2: Tiṇṇaṁ saṁyogānaṁ visaye agyāgāraṁ, vutyassa iti hoti.
anya-e0807n0:157_0: Taṁ karoti, taṁ khaṇaṁ, saṁ gato, taṁ ghataṁ, dhammaṁ care, taṁ channaṁ, taṁ jātaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:157_1: taṁ jhānaṁ, taṁ ñāṇaṁ, taṁ ṭhānaṁ, taṁ ḍahati, taṁ tanoti, taṁ thiraṁ, taṁ dānaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:157_2: taṁ dhanaṁ, taṁ niccutaṁ, taṁ patto, taṁ phalaṁ, tesaṁ bodho, saṁ bhūto, taṁ mittaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:159_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hotīti nimittānussarānaṁ paccāsatyā tabbaggapañcamo
anya-e0807n0:159_1: hoti. Paccāsatti nāma ṭhānato āsannatā guṇato vā, guṇatoti vaṇṇasaññādiguṇato. Niggahītassa
anya-e0807n0:159_2: anusarīyatīti pacchā katvā sarīyatīti anussarotipi vuccati. Taṅkaroti=taṁ karoti,
anya-e0807n0:159_3: evaṁ taṅkhaṇaṁ, saṅgato, taṅghataṁ. Dhammañcare, tañchannaṁ, tañjātaṁ, tañjhānaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:159_4: taññāṇaṁ. Taṇṭhānaṁ, taṇḍahati. Tantanoti, tanthiraṁ, tandānaṁ, tandhanaṁ, tanniccutaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:159_5: tampatto, tamphalaṁ, tesammodho, sambhūto, tammittaṁ. Kiṅkato, dātuṅgato, taṇhaṅkaro,
anya-e0807n0:160: Ānantarikaṁ ya+māhu, yaṁ yadeva, paccattaṁ eva, taṁ hiitī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:162_0: Ya+eva+hisaddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti. “Vaggalasehi te”ti yassa ñakāro. Ānantarikañña+māhu=ānantarikaṁ
anya-e0807n0:162_1: ya+māhu, yaññadeva=yaṁyadeva, ñassa dvitte paccattaññeva, paccattaṁ eva, tañhi, tañhi.
anya-e0807n0:162_2: “Abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate”ti ñāyā evasaddasahacariyā “ya” iti sabbādiyasaddasseva gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0807n0:165_0: Saṁsaddassa yaṁ niggahītaṁ, tassa vā ño hoti yakāre. Saññogo=saṁyogo, evaṁ saṁyojanaṁ,
anya-e0807n0:165_1: saññato, saññācikāya. Idha yakāramattova gayhate. Saṁssāti kiṁ, etaṁ yojanaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0807n0:166: Taṁ eva, taṁ ahaṁ brūmi, yaṁ āhu, dhanaṁ eva, kiṁ etaṁ, nindituṁ arahati, taṁ idaṁ, yaṁ aniccaṁ, taṁ anattā, etaṁ avoca, etaṁ eva itī+dha –
anya-e0807n0:168_0: Niggahītassa ma ya dā honti vā sare kvaci. Tameva taṁ eva, tamahaṁ brūmi=taṁ ahaṁ
anya-e0807n0:168_1: brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṁ, ninditumarahati. Tayidaṁ. Yadaniccaṁ, tadanattā,
anya-e0807n0:168_2: etadavoca, etadeva. “Mayadā”ti yogavibhāgā buddhama saraṇama iccādi bhavati.
anya-e0807n0:170_0: Tadaminādīni nippajjanti. “Ya+dalakkhaṇikaṁ, taṁ nipātanā”ti ñāyā lakkhaṇantarena
anya-e0807n0:170_1: avihitā desa+lopā+gama+vipallāsā, sabbattha imināva daṭṭhabbā. Idañca paresaṁ pisodarādimiva
anya-e0807n0:170_2: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Phusitaṁ=jalabindu, phusita+mudara+massa pisodaraṁ. Issa akāre taṁ iminā=tadaminā,
anya-e0807n0:170_3: sakiṁ āgāmī=sakadāgāmī, dhassa dakāre ekaṁ idha ahaṁ=eka+midā+haṁ, vidhassa vidādeso
anya-e0807n0:170_4: saṁvidhāya avahāro=saṁvidāvahāro, vārisaddassa vakāre, hassa lakāre ca kate vārivāhako=valāhako,
anya-e0807n0:170_5: jīvanassa jīādeso, jīvanassa muto=jīmūto. Chavassa suādese, sayanassa sānādese ca
anya-e0807n0:170_6: kate chavassa sayanaṁ=susānaṁ. Uddhassa uduādese, khassa khalaādese ca “saramhā dve”ti
anya-e0807n0:170_7: dvittādimhi ca kate uddhaṁ khaṁ assa udukkhalaṁ. Pisitassa piādese, asassa sācādese
anya-e0807n0:171: Mahīsaddassa mayūādese, ravatissa rādese ca kate mahiyaṁ ravatīti mayūro. Eva+maññepi payogato+nugantabbā. Ettha ca –
anya-e0807n0:176_0: Yathā dvāre niyutto=dovārikoti okaāgamo. Hiṁsasaddassa sīhoti vipallāso. Nijako=niyakoti
anya-e0807n0:176_1: vikāro. Mehanassa khassa mālā mekhalāti vaṇṇalopo, ha+na+makārānaṁ lopo. Mayūroti
anya-e0807n0:177: Yathariva tathariveti nipātāva. “Jaraggavā vicintesuṁ, vara+mhākaṁ bhusāmive”ti ettha ivasaddo evakārattho. Niggahītasandhi.
